allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: INTERVEE - Philippine OSH Interview Assistant

Features:
- React Native + Expo mobile app with dark theme UI
- Node.js backend with WebSocket real-time communication
- OpenAI integration \(Whisper STT + GPT-4o\)
- English/Tagalog/Taglish language support
- OSH knowledge base \(RA 11058, OSHS Rules 1020-1960\)
- Redis caching for fast responses
- PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM

Mobile screens:
- Interview \(main\) - Large answer display with live transcript
- History - Past session viewer
- Settings - Configuration options

Backend services:
- Real-time audio streaming via WebSocket
- Question detection for EN/TL/Taglish
- Streaming GPT-4o responses
- Response caching

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
